crossdisplay.h File Reference

Defines CrossDisplay-specific public functions on Linux and Windows(XP, Vista and above); 32bit and 64bit platforms. More...


Defines

#define ADL_EXTERNC
 Functions in this file include ones for retrieving CrossDisplay capabilities, retrieving CrossDisplay status, and setting CrossDisplay configurations.

Detailed Description

Defines CrossDisplay-specific public functions on Linux and Windows(XP, Vista and above); 32bit and 64bit platforms.

Copyright (c) 2008 - 2018 Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. THIS CODE AND INFORMATION IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND/OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. This file contains all CrossDisplay-related functions exposed by ADL for public use on Linux and Windows(XP, Vista and above); 32bit and 64bit platforms.

Define Documentation

#define ADL_EXTERNC

Functions in this file include ones for retrieving CrossDisplay capabilities, retrieving CrossDisplay status, and setting CrossDisplay configurations.
